sentence.Network_en: Some of them were impudent and insulting.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们当中的一些人放肆无礼，目中无人。

sentence.Network_en: The teacher threatened to kick the impudent pupil out of the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 老师威胁着要把这无礼的小学生撵出教室.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... imprudent 轻率的；不智的 impudent 鲁莽的，无礼的 impugn 指责，对…表示怀疑.
英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... imposing 堂皇的>谦虚的 impudent 放肆无礼的>恭敬的/恭敬的，有礼貌的 inauspicious 不吉利的>吉利的.
英语单词的奥秘 - luozhong10的日志 - 网易博客 ... tamping（ 填塞，填充）； impudent（ 无礼的，放肆的）； amount（ 数量，数额…
牛津大学英语词典 ... ride bareback 骑马不用马鞍. impudent;shameless 厚颜无耻的; 不要脸的: a barefaced lie 无耻的谎言 *.

list.abs: Why will you tolerate that impudent fellow ?, 你为什么要忍受那个冒失的家伙呢?
I won ' t tolerate that impudent boy ., 我不能宽容那无礼的男孩.
浑的组词_百度知道 ... [simple and honest] 淳朴;朴实 [impudent remark] 无聊的话;开玩笑的话;糊涂话 [whole family] 全家.
he can go die . this impudent guy .他可以去死了。不知廉耻的家伙。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'immodest, indelicate'): from Latin impudent-, from in- 'not' + pudent- 'ashamed, modest' (from pudere 'be ashamed')

entry.def: If you describe someone as impudent, you mean they are rude or disrespectful, or do something they have no right to do.

example.ex: Some of them were impudent and insulting.
example.tran: 他们当中的一些人放肆无礼,目中无人。

sentences.sentence: "the student was kept in for impudent behavior"
"impertinent of a child to lecture a grownup"
"an impudent boy given to insulting strangers"

auth_sentence.content: Insolent or audacious in address; coolly impudent or presuming.
auth_sentence.res_content: Insolent or audacious in address; coolly impudent or presuming.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Insolent or audacious in address; coolly impudent or presuming.

auth_sentence.content: The remark had been injudicious and...undeniably impudent.
auth_sentence.res_content: The remark had been injudicious and...undeniably impudent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The remark had been injudicious and...undeniably impudent.

auth_sentence.content: One reviewer called the book an impudent attempt at humbugging the public.
auth_sentence.res_content: One reviewer called the book an impudent attempt at humbugging the public.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: One reviewer called the book an impudent attempt at humbugging the public.

stems_affixes.word_buile: im不+pud感到羞耻+ent……的→不羞耻→无礼的
im不+pud感到羞耻+icity→不感觉羞耻
re反+pud感到羞耻+iate表动词→反过来让别人羞耻→拒绝别人

sentences.en: The teacher threatened to kick the impudent pupil out of the room.
sentences.cn: 老师威胁着要把这无礼的小学生撵出教室。

sentences.en: She’s tolerant toward those impudent colleagues.
sentences.cn: 她对那些无礼的同事采取容忍的态度。
